Package org.jdesktop.swingx.ws.yahoo.rss

Class Summary
YahooCompanyFinanceNews A simple JavaBean that queries Yahoo! for news items related to one or more companies, identified by stock ticker symbol.
YahooCompanyFinanceNewsBeanInfo  
YahooFinanceNews A simple JavaBean encapsulating access to the Yahoo! Finance News RSS feeds.
YahooFinanceNewsBeanInfo  
YahooNews A simple JavaBean encapsulating access to the Yahoo! News RSS feeds.
YahooNewsBeanInfo  
YahooRSS Base class from which YahooRSS feeds extend.
 

Enum Summary
YahooCompanyFinanceNews.Type The type of news items to return.
 

Exception Summary
RSSException Exception thrown if some problem occurs while reading a feed.
